scripts.build:all: pnpm build:tokens && pnpm build:icons && pnpm build:ui
scripts.publish:all: pnpm build:all && pnpm --filter @sbddesign/bui-tokens publish && pnpm --filter @sbddesign/bui-icons publish && pnpm --filter @sbddesign/bui-ui publish
scripts.version:patch: pnpm --filter @sbddesign/bui-tokens version patch && pnpm --filter @sbddesign/bui-icons version patch && pnpm --filter @sbddesign/bui-ui version patch
scripts.version:minor: pnpm --filter @sbddesign/bui-tokens version minor && pnpm --filter @sbddesign/bui-icons version minor && pnpm --filter @sbddesign/bui-ui version minor
scripts.version:major: pnpm --filter @sbddesign/bui-tokens version major && pnpm --filter @sbddesign/bui-icons version major && pnpm --filter @sbddesign/bui-ui version major
scripts.publish:dry-run: pnpm build:all && pnpm --filter @sbddesign/bui-tokens publish --dry-run && pnpm --filter @sbddesign/bui-icons publish --dry-run && pnpm --filter @sbddesign/bui-ui publish --dry-run
